page.title: 03CROOKEDHOLM GALA DAY.
page.content: The chairman of the Gala Day is Mr. Hopes. He has been running the Gala Day for nearly 10 years with the help of Mrs Sprot who organizes the games. The Gala Day had been stopped years ago but it has started again. Before, the people used to get a train to Ayr from Barleith on a Co-operative Society trip. The Gala Day started when this ended. The Queen gets chosen by the headmaster of the school and so do the attendants and the page-boy. This is what happens on the Gala Week: Mon:holiday Tues:children's show: Wed:disco Thur:variety special Fri:talent show Sat:supper dance Sun:Songs of Praise. On Gala Day they have a parade, crowning of queen, competitions, games and stalls.
